price: Emu na wͻbεtena afe bͻͻ, na wͻnnya okyitaafoͻ anaa ͻboafoͻ (biara).
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
